mapper.insert: insert into app_hospital(hos_name, hos_addr, hos_tel, hos_time, hos_sub, hos_busno) values(#{hosName}, #{hosAddr}, #{hosTel}, #{hosTime}, #{hosSub}, #{hosBusno})
mapper.select: select hos_no, hos_name, hos_addr, hos_tel, hos_time, hos_sub, hos_busno from app_hospital order by hos_no desc
select hos_no, hos_name, hos_addr, hos_tel, hos_time, hos_sub, hos_busno from app_hospital where hos_tel = #{tel}
select hos_no, hos_name, hos_addr, hos_tel, hos_time, hos_sub, hos_busno from app_hospital where hos_no=#{hosNo}
mapper.update:
update app_hospital set hos_name=#{hosName}, hos_addr=#{hosAddr}, hos_tel=#{hosTel}, hos_time=#{hosTime}, hos_sub=#{hosSub}, hos_busno=#{hosBusno}
where hos_no=#{hospitalNo}
